attributes.action: Apple iphone 5 To Be Released By End Of August
attributes.additional_details: As most of us are aware, there is a new iphone coming out very soon. Like myself, i am sure there are millions of brits that have been waiting for this latest version of apple's must have gadget since june when it should have been released but it wasn't. On behalf of the people that are eagerly awaiting this necessity, i am raising this petition to the UK government to encourage Apple to release there latest addiction within the end of this month.
